dict.acceptation: 鱼，鱼肉，鱼类；〈口〉（特殊的）人物，家伙，东西；[建]接合板，夹片，鱼尾板；[航]钓锚器，撑夹桅杆的加固夹箍；
钓鱼，捕鱼；搜寻；[航]加夹箍夹牢；[工]用接合板连接[加固]；

sent.orig: The anaerobic digested sludge of high concentration was determined in experiment FISH, MPN andmethanogentic activity.
sent.trans: 以高浓度厌氧消化污泥为对象，进行FISH、PN和产甲烷活性的测定实验。

sent.orig: Fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) technique developed.
sent.trans: 发明原位免疫荧光杂交(FISH)技术。

sent.orig: Conclusion FISH technique is effective and useful in the identification of BAC clones for array CGH.
sent.trans: 结论：BAC克隆作为探针点样制备CGH微阵列时，FISH法鉴定是必要的。

sent.orig: To make prenatal diagnosis of chromosome aneuploidies by FISH analysis of chromosome-specific probes in interphase amniocytes.
sent.trans: 应用染色体特异性探针对羊水间期细胞进行FISH分析。

sent.orig: Using a written FISH function, the initial imperfections within the specimen were prescribed.
sent.trans: 利用FISH函数于试样内部规定初始缺陷。
